archimate:DataObject.name: ResourceManagementPolicy
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The ResourceManagementPolicy class defines the particular policies that are used to define how different aspects of the Resource are managed and maintained. For example; assume that a Resource is made up of several component parts; such as different Equipment. One of these Equipment might require multiple PartyRoles to approve changes to its configuration; whereas another Equipment might not require any approvals to change its configuration.
